DataElement.preferredName: Collection Specimen Requirement Storage Type StorageType
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The act of gathering things together; having been brought together in one place.:A part of a thing, or of several things, taken to demonstrate or to determine the character of the whole, e.g. a substance, or portion of material obtained for use in testing, examination, or study; particularly, a preparation of tissue or bodily fluid taken for examination or diagnosis.:Something that is necessary; condition, something that is obligatory._The act of safekeeping goods in a depository.:Something distinguishable as an identifiable class based on common qualities._Describes whether the specimen is to be automatically assigned an available storage container or manually allocated or stored in a virtual position

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: The act of gathering things together; having been brought together in one place.:A part of a thing, or of several things, taken to demonstrate or to determine the character of the whole, e.g. a substance, or portion of material obtained for use in testing, examination, or study; particularly, a preparation of tissue or bodily fluid taken for examination or diagnosis.:Something that is necessary; condition, something that is obligatory._The act of safekeeping goods in a depository.:Something distinguishable as an identifiable class based on common qualities.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: The act of gathering things together; having been brought together in one place.:A part of a thing, or of several things, taken to demonstrate or to determine the character of the whole, e.g. a substance, or portion of material obtained for use in testing, examination, or study; particularly, a preparation of tissue or bodily fluid taken for examination or diagnosis.:Something that is necessary; condition, something that is obligatory.

Concepts.definition: The act of gathering things together; having been brought together in one place.

A part of a thing, or of several things, taken to demonstrate or to determine the character of the whole, e.g. a substance, or portion of material obtained for use in testing, examination, or study; particularly, a preparation of tissue or bodily fluid taken for examination or diagnosis.

Property.preferredDefinition: The act of safekeeping goods in a depository.:Something distinguishable as an identifiable class based on common qualities.

Concepts.definition: The act of safekeeping goods in a depository.
Something distinguishable as an identifiable class based on common qualities.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Default Conceptual Domain for UML Loader

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: Describes whether the specimen is to be automatically assigned an available storage container or manually allocated or stored in a virtual position

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Operating with minimal human intervention; independent of external control.

Concepts.definition: Operating with minimal human intervention; independent of external control.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Of or related to the hands; reference to a task or activity being done by hand (as opposed as being performed with the assistance of automation or other supportive means).

Concepts.definition: Of or related to the hands; reference to a task or activity being done by hand (as opposed as being performed with the assistance of automation or other supportive means).

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: An operation in which a term denies or inverts the meaning of another term or construction.:Having substance or material existence; concerned with material things; of or pertaining to the body as distinguished from the mind or spirit.:A position, site, or point in space where something can be found.

Concepts.definition: An operation in which a term denies or inverts the meaning of another term or construction.
Having substance or material existence; concerned with material things; of or pertaining to the body as distinguished from the mind or spirit.
A position, site, or point in space where something can be found.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: An organizational header for concepts representing mostly abstract entities.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: Type; a subdivision of a particular kind of thing.

Concepts.definition: Something distinguishable as an identifiable class based on common qualities.
